kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

Sleep

Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
Runs the specified keyword and returns the status as a Boolean value.
